Articles.Content: Where I can find the Interstellar tech tree that works with 1.0?

What KSPI TechTree are you searching for?

Since the only active KSPI at the moment is KSPI Extended, which uses the CommunityTechTree/TechTree mods based on the CTT.

There is no other 1.0.x KSPI tech tree that I m aware of.

> 
> What KSPI TechTree are you searching for?
> Since the only active KSPI at the moment is KSPI Extended, which uses the CommunityTechTree/TechTree mods based on the CTT.
> 
> There is no other 1.0.x KSPI tech tree that I m aware of.

Im talking about the KSPI tech tree what comes with [TechManager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98293-0-25-0-90-TechManager-Version-1-5). TechManager does not work with 1.0 though. I wonder is there a way to use that tree config with some other mod what lets you edit techtrees.
